column1: Presumed Infection in Febrile Neutropenic Patient
column2: zap02, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My mother, who had Acute Lymphocytic Leukemia, went to the hospital with a slight fever. She was admitted and put on the antibiotic cefepime.24 hours later, she fell into an encephalitic coma. She remained in this debilitating state for almost 1 month before I discovered this possible side effect of cefepime and had it withdrawn. My mother awoke 24 hours later but her body was decimated by that time and her mind was deeply affected. She died about a month and a half later.

column1: Pneumonia caused by the Bacteria Pseudomonas Aeruginosa
column2: bruno, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Contaminated well water...thought the home had a filtration system, but home owners lied.  cefepime was the second iv medicine, and it seems to be working much better for me.  Side affects for me are: no appetite, headache to migraines, nausea, pain in joints, pressure in chest.  I started the 2nd week.  Hopefully just 2 weeks will be all I need. I starting to feel better, and not coughing as much.  Pseudomonas e.  is so hard to get under control.  Good luck to everyone, and hope you feel better soon...

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My brother (age 52 with CTCL) took this medication for two weeks for skin infection. He had severe nausea, diarrhea, abdominal discomfort, and loss of apetite. His skin lesions did not get better. I was really concerned. If he recovers from these side effects, he will begin another round of chemo.

column2: Floral Designer, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I am in my 4th week of 6, the taste this drug leaves in my mouth is so medicinal and wretched that no food taste edible, it causes nausea, no amount of tooth brushing or gargling will get rid of it.  It has made me vomit, I get chills, I just started getting a sore throat and can't swallow. This drug has horrible side effects that they really  play down. I am going to ask my Dr. to prescribe something else.  It was my forehead bone that was infected and it has been removed, so I don't know why I need to suffer more by taking this nasty drug.

column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: i had an unusual infection of the end plates in my spine.  I have an old passed down story that I was allergic to penicillin/amoxicillin (sp)when I was a child. After approximately 3 weeks of use I developed an allergic reaction.  It would instant make my stomach upset and my upper torso feel as though it were on fire...then i would get a migraine and a rash.  It was aweful.  I couldnt sleep, was getting the hot and cold spells, would sweat terribly when I did get some sleep and felt generally very ill.  I was pulled off of it and placed an Merrem.I was taking 20 ml via syringe 2x's a day in a picc line.  Now my blood counts are a mess again and I am off spraying Lysol on everything.

column2: karen, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: only been on for 4 weeks,suffered for 5 years with mrsa and pseudomonas,colonized in both hips due to brown-recluse spider bite.praying it will cure me.nausea,tiredness some weight loss.will all be worth it if it works.have been on too many iv anti-biotics that haven't worked.if anyone has serious infections,get to a dr that will get you on correct anti-biotics asap,i have just about lost my legs over this.numerous surgeries ect.i pray god will finish curing me now,and he will use this medication.
